title: Jacket
description: red, white and indigo batik jacket with a long back; three bands of embroidery in front with batik designs surrounding front opening, and on the shoulders and sleeves;  three black bands end front designs;  back has 10 1/2\" of solid batik designs, then 27\" of solid cross stitch bands (some divided by black strips) in red and yellow; lined in pieced blue denim-like fabric; back is edged with black strip; decorative loop and knot closure in front
